title: STA-TCN: Neural Decoder for Upper Limb Rehabilitation
image: figures/STA-TCN Neural Decoder for Upper Limb Rehabilitation.png
description: Continuous motion prediction using sEMG for cable-driven exoskeletons. A Spatio-Temporal Attention and lightweight Temporal Convolutional Network (STA-TCN) architecture for subject-independent, real-time estimation of elbow joint angles.

title: Robotic Catheter System for Cardiac Ablation
image: figures/Robotic Catheter System for Cardiac Ablation.png
description: Robot-assisted catheter ablation system improving precision, safety and feedback. Development of a robot ablation catheter system for cardiac ablation therapy, aimed at improving the precision, safety and usability of catheter-based treatments for atrial fibrillation.

title: Automated Analog IC Layout System
description: Automated layout generation for matched resistors and capacitors. This project tackles the problem of device mismatch in analog integrated circuits by developing an automated layout generation system.

title: RRT Motion Planner
description: Rapidly-exploring random tree motion planner for a manipulator. Course project implementing a rapidly-exploring random tree (RRT) algorithm to plan collision-free paths for a robotic arm.

title: Fynthesizer
description: Modular audio synthesizer. Designed and built a small audio synthesizer as a course project, focusing on modular sound generation and signal processing.

title: Vision-Controlled Vibrating Robot
description: Vibrating robot controlled via computer vision. Created a robot that uses computer-vision feedback to control a vibrating platform for remote exploration and manipulation tasks.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive data visualization dashboard for analyzing healthcare metrics. Built with D3.js and React to provide real-time insights into patient data and treatment outcomes.

title: Machine Learning Model Optimizer
description: Automated hyperparameter tuning system for deep learning models. Implemented using Bayesian optimization to reduce training time by 40% while improving model accuracy.

title: Smart Home IoT System
description: Integrated IoT system for home automation using Arduino and Raspberry Pi. Features include voice control, automated lighting, and energy monitoring with mobile app interface.

title: Natural Language Processing Chatbot
description: AI-powered customer service chatbot using transformer-based models. Deployed on cloud infrastructure with 95% accuracy in intent classification and multilingual support.

title: Computer Vision Object Detection
description: Real-time object detection system for autonomous vehicles. Implemented using YOLO architecture with custom training on driving scenarios to achieve 30 FPS performance.

title: Blockchain Supply Chain Tracker
description: Decentralized supply chain management system using Ethereum smart contracts. Provides transparent tracking of products from manufacture to delivery with immutable records.
